results.title: Simvastatin alleviates experimental autoimmune encephalomyelitis through regulating the balance of Th17 and Treg in mice.
results.text_hl: The levels of interleukin-17 and @GENE_TGFB1 @GENE_7040 @@@transforming growth factor-beta@@@ (@GENE_TGFB1 @GENE_7040 @@@TGF-beta@@@) were detected using enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA). In the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_AG_490 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C095512 @@@AG490@@@ groups, recovery from @<m>DISEASE_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009422 @@@neurological impairment@@@ was earlier compared to the @DISEASE_Encephalomyelitis_Autoimmune_Experimental @DISEASE_MESH:D004681 @@@EAE@@@ group, and the symptoms were notably improved.

results.title: Statins ameliorate oxaliplatin- and paclitaxel-induced peripheral neuropathy via glutathione-S-transferase.

results.title: Lipid modulation in insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus: effect on microvascular outcomes.

results.title: Simvastatin promotes neurite outgrowth in the presence of inhibitory molecules found in central nervous system injury.
